keyEvents.title: Luffy Watches Ace's Vivre Card Burn
keyEvents.description: Luffy sits on Level 5.5 with Jinbe, anxiously watching Ace's Vivre Card continue to burn.
keyEvents.significance: Serves as the framing device for the entire retrospective episode, establishing the present-day tension.

description: A secret hidden level between Level 5 and Level 6 of Impel Down, created by Emporio Ivankov. It serves as a sanctuary for prisoners who have escaped their cells.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Ace's Reunion
keyEvents.description: Flashback to Luffy and Ace's reunion in Arabasta, where they discuss their dreams and Ace's pride in the Whitebeard Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Key location for establishing Ace's character and his relationship with both Luffy and Whitebeard.

keyEvents.title: Ace Gives Luffy His Vivre Card
keyEvents.description: Before departing Arabasta, Ace gives Luffy his Vivre Card to ensure they can meet again.
keyEvents.significance: The Vivre Card becomes a crucial plot device throughout the Summit War Saga.

description: A desert kingdom and the location where Luffy and Ace reunited during the Arabasta Arc.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's First Encounter with Blackbeard
keyEvents.description: Flashback to Luffy's first meeting with Marshall D. Teach in Mock Town, where they argue about cherry pie.
keyEvents.significance: Laden with dramatic irony as Luffy has no idea this man will capture Ace and trigger the Summit War.

description: A lawless pirate town on Jaya island where Luffy first encountered Blackbeard without knowing his identity.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Learns of Ace's Execution
keyEvents.description: Flashback to the moment when Luffy learned from Elder Nyon about Ace's scheduled execution at Marineford.
keyEvents.significance: The inciting incident that sets Luffy on the path to Impel Down and the Summit War.

description: An island in the Calm Belt inhabited only by women, ruled by the Pirate Empress Boa Hancock. The location where Luffy learned about Ace's execution.

keyEvents.title: Ace Recalls His Defeat
keyEvents.description: The scene shifts to Ace imprisoned at Marineford, recalling his battle with Blackbeard.
keyEvents.significance: Provides Ace's perspective and establishes the current crisis location.

keyEvents.title: Three Hours Before Execution
keyEvents.description: Ace awaits his fate at Marineford, locked in chains with only three hours until execution.
keyEvents.significance: Creates intense tension and establishes the ticking clock for the Marineford Arc.

description: The main headquarters of the Marines, where Ace is imprisoned and scheduled to be executed. The site of the upcoming Summit War.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Ace's Childhood Bond
keyEvents.description: Flashback to Luffy and Ace's childhood on Dawn Island, showing them eating, sleeping, and training together.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the deep emotional connection that motivates Luffy's rescue mission.

description: The island in East Blue where Luffy and Ace grew up together, forming their brotherhood.
